name: Sonic 2: Chemical Plant Zone GB (just the music!)
name_original: Sonic 2: Chemical Plant Zone GB (just the music!)
description:
Just a little piece to show off a fun song cover I made in HUGETracker!

ROM made in GB Studio. 

Thanks to the ancient sprite hackers Yawackhary/Xenowhirl/ICEKnight, and ancient sound hacker Tadd Nuznov (this isn't a TI-83 but I think you'd appreciate it).
